document.discussion_title: Don Doxsie talks about his book Iowa Baseball Greats. - Story
document.topic_text:
Don Doxsie talks about his book Iowa Baseball Greats. Don Doxsie talks about his book Iowa Baseball Greats. By Jay Kidwell | Updated 08/21 2016 11:00PM ROCK ISLAND, Ill. Don Doxsie has been in the newspaper business for 40 years, now the long time sports writer has written his 2nd book, Iowa Baseball Greats. He joined Jay Kidwell on FOX 18 Sports Sunday to talk about his latest book.
Copyright 2016 Nexstar Broadcasting, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.
